TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. However, because of my lack of good hearing, you become an Aryan. During a new uprising of that German party in WWII, you are kidnapped, and forced into working for them. (Didn't expect that one, did you!)

I wish I didn't have to look up stuff.

Granted. Enjoy your lobotomy!

I wish I could change my appearance at will.

Granted, but the only appearance you know is a turd

I wish Justin Beiber didn't exist(nice one joemamma)

Granted. Your last will and testament includes directions and funds to change your appearance.

Edit for ninja: Granted. Justin Barber, who is twice as popular and half as talented, takes his place.

I wish every driver used their turn signals correctly.

Granted, but all turns are replaced with roundabouts.

I wish that everyone on the internet could go 5 seconds without fighting one another

Granted, but the fighting resumes on the streets as oppose to the interwebs

I wish people called the internet the interwebs.

Granted. Everyone laughs at this so hard that they die.

I wish for KFC: Kerbal Fried Corgis.

Granted. But instead it's Kerbal Fried Cogs. And the cogs are made of asbestos. So you die after you eat them. (note: they were also flavoured with arsenic)

I wish i wasnt psychopathic.

Granted, but now your depressed.

I wish I was president.

Granted. You are now Richard Nixon, and are forced to resign by your Nixon brain.

I wish I had a value relation modifier.

Edited June 13, 2014 by Tery215

granted, it prices your existence to that off nothing as it was considered equal that of poo which makes you to kill yourself

i wish that i had a supercomputer

Granted. It becomes Skynet. Yup.

I wish for something original.

Granted. But instead original its organical. You get killed by thousands of human organs falling from space.

I wish i didnt use instead everyteim.
Granted, the only thing you can say is 'On the other hand', the entire time

On the other hand on the other hand On the other hand on the other hand On the other hand on the other hand.

I wish to be cursed.

Granted. You are cursed to have infinite good fortune, so you no longer find a challenge in life and kill yourself.

I wish that I could write better short stories.

Granted. They are too long to write.

I wish you would stop looking at my signature.

Granted. However, everyone else stares at it without end.

I wish I didn't have chronic insomnia. I'm so tired.

Granted. Now you sleep all the time. Ur like snorlax.

I wish i hadnt always such strange dreams.

Granted, you never dream again and go insane.

I wish for aÃƒÂ¶gsdllllllllllllllllllllll

Granted. The Wishmaking Fairy assumes it's a new kind of virus that only kills people who wish.

I wish that feeding cobwebs turned the cobwebs into dogs.

Granted. However, that virus you conjured up kills you before you can witness the wish.

I wish for a romantic chemical.

Granted. It only works on a gender that doesn't exist.

I wish for computers to be available in nowhere.

Granted, they are only available nowhere.

I wish I was a goat.

Granted, but you are the goat in goat simulator.

I wish to create a city for kerbals (Simcity style)
